de.engehausen.treemap.swing.impl

Class CushionRectangleRenderer<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.swing.impl.CushionRectangleRenderer<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node the renderer supports
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRectangleRenderer<N,java.awt.Graphics2D,java.awt.Color>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CushionRectangleRendererEx

    public class CushionRectangleRenderer<N>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRectangleRenderer<N,java.awt.Graphics2D,java.awt.Color>
    Rectangle renderer that attempts to produce a "cushion effect" for the rectangles. It does not paint any labels. The renderer is not thread safe and cannot be shared between different threads.

        Description copied from interface: IRectangleRenderer
        Renders the given rectangle.
        Specified by:
        render in interface IRectangleRenderer<N,java.awt.Graphics2D,java.awt.Color>
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphics to render on, must not be null.
        model - the model the rectangle belongs to, must not be null.
        rectangle - the rectangle to render, must not be null.
        colorProvider - provider for the color of the rectangle, must not be null.
        labelProvider - provider for the label of the rectangle, may be null.

      • highlight

        public void highlight(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
             ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model,
             IRectangle<N> rectangle,
             IColorProvider<N,java.awt.Color> colorProvider,
             ILabelProvider<N> labelProvider)
        Description copied from interface: IRectangleRenderer
        Renders the given rectangle in "highlighted" mode. An implementor may safely assume that the given rectangle has already been rendered onto the graphics normally.
        Specified by:
        highlight in interface IRectangleRenderer<N,java.awt.Graphics2D,java.awt.Color>
        Parameters:
        graphics - the graphics to render on, must not be null.
        model - the model the rectangle belongs to, must not be null.
        rectangle - the rectangle to render, must not be null.
        colorProvider - provider for the color of the rectangle, must not be null.
        labelProvider - provider for the label of the rectangle, may be null.
